title: A letter from Sr Matthew Hale, Kt. sometime Lord Chief Justice of England: to one of his sons, after his recovery from the small-pox
author: Hale, Matthew, Sir, 1609-1676.
publisher: printed by J. Playford, for W. Shrowsbery, at the sign of the Bible in Duke-lane,
notes: Running title: A letter from Sir M. Hale, to one of his sons.
Reproduction of original in the Columbia University Library.
